official_title: A bill to amend the Truth in Lending Act to encourage cash discounts.

summary.text: Amends the Truth in Lending Act to stipulate that any discount (currently, discounts up to five percent) offered by a seller from the "regular price" to induce payment by cash or other means not involving an open-end credit plan or credit card shall not constitute a finance charge. Requires that a seller make known to buyers the availability of a discount.
